Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class IIc bacteriocin
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Most streptococci (except S.rattus and S. mutans), Listeria spp., enterococci and staphylococci.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Uberolysin a novel cyclic bacteriocin produced by Streptococcus uberis.
Literature.Author: Wirawan RE, Swanson KM, Kleffmann T, Jack RW, Tagg JR.
